name: Snake Escape (TeeJay)
description:
In Snake Escape you play as an apple who is tired of being eaten by snakes! Buy Upgrades and dodge the snake to survive until the snake gets cornered.

Controls

WASD to Move

Ctrl to Freeze time

Space to Place Crates

Credits

Thanks Pjut for creating the music and sound effects and some of the assets!

Have Fun!
